name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise canceling with Dual Noise Sensor technology. 30hr battery life, multipoint connection, and crystal-clear hands-free calling.

name: Apple MacBook Air M3
description: Supercharged by M3 chip. Up to 18 hours of battery life. 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display. 8GB unified memory.

name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Retro
description: The shoe that started it all. Classic silhouette reimagined with premium leather upper and Air-Sole unit for legendary cushioning.

name: Samsung 4K OLED Monitor 27"
description: Quantum Dot OLED technology with 240Hz refresh rate. DisplayHDR True Black 400. Perfect for creators and gamers alike.

name: Levi's 512 Slim Taper Jeans
description: Slim through the hip and thigh with a taper to the ankle. Made with stretch denim for all-day comfort.

name: Rolex Submariner Watch
description: The quintessential diver's watch. Oystersteel case, unidirectional rotatable bezel, waterproof to 300m. A timeless icon.

name: DJI Mini 4 Pro Drone
description: 4K/60fps HDR video. Omnidirectional obstacle sensing. 34-min max flight time. Foldable design under 249g.

name: The North Face Nuptse Jacket
description: 700-fill goose down insulation in the iconic boxy silhouette. Water-resistant shell. Packs into its own pocket.

name: Kindle Paperwhite 16GB
description: 6.8" glare-free display. Adjustable warm light. Up to 10 weeks of battery. Waterproof IPX8. Stores thousands of books.

name: Ray-Ban Aviator Sunglasses
description: Classic double bridge metal frame with crystal lenses. 100% UV protection. The original aviator since 1936.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 23
description: BOOST midsole returns energy with every step. Primeknit+ upper adapts to your foot. Continental rubber outsole.

name: Louis Vuitton Neverfull Tote
description: Iconic Monogram canvas tote in GM size. Natural cowhide leather trim. Removable zip pouch included.

name: PlayStation 5 Console
description: Ultra-high speed SSD. 4K-TV gaming. Up to 120fps. Ray tracing. HDR. Tempest 3D AudioTech.

name: Uniqlo Ultra Light Down Jacket
description: Feather-light 90/10 down fill. Packs into its own pocket for easy carrying. Wind and water resistant outer shell.

name: Dyson V15 Detect Vacuum
description: Laser detects invisible dust. Piezo sensor proves dust is gone. Up to 60min run time. HEPA filtration.

name: Nespresso Vertuo Pop Coffee
description: Centrifusion technology for perfect crema. Compatible with all Vertuo capsules. 5 cup sizes. Fast heat-up in 30 seconds.
